title: This Champion was already chosen as your Husband/Wife before you were born.

embed.description: Random character/item generator for League of Legends. Includes all game modes: Classic, Dominion, Twisted Treeline and Proving Grounds. Updated for Season 3.

body:
Rules are that you click the LoL random champ generator. You can choose the champion, or argue against fate and roll again to be stuck with the final champion.

Mine was {{champion:21}} !!!

..I don't think it has Rek'sai though.

replies.body: {{champion:1}} is it bad that I'm really not bothered by this in any way......
I bet you can't wait till she hits 6
Of course who wouldn't want to hug tibbers HES A FLIPPIN GIANT TEDDY BEAR. But, i need some protection {{item:1057}}

I actually did get Ahri on first try.

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/138/246/tumblr_lltzgnHi5F1qzib3wo1_400.jpg
LOL

Vel'Koz.
... I... 
I'll make it work.

but he's so busy with anal...
...lysing poros
lulu that is gonna be fun wink wink nudge nudge she is small where it counts ;)
"HUGIFY"
{{champion:37}} ...Same gender, but so cute...This is a hard decision.

I'll gladly take her off your hands.

Edit - I got {{champion:81}}.

Trade pls?
We'd need to have a talk about that hairstyle first.

And the tendency to go bottom.

Unless you're into that sort of thing, then npnp.
{{champion:44}} gets it

{{champion:106}}

uh
Same.

Sejuani.
I am absolutely fine with that . . . .
More than fine.
lol Ahri first try...
{{champion:117}} I guess it could work out. My only concern is a spontaneous Wild Growth in a wrong moment.
{{champion:99}} I mean she is hot...but after a while..i think that laugh might just turn me insane

Got {{champion:266}} . Im a dude. If i wasnt it would still be weird
Tried it again, got {{champion:254}} . pretty happy with that, i mean i got my main so i must be happy.
well she's a lesbian soooo...
{{champion:2}}  Brolaf and me will forever be bros in holy brotramony. Please be gentle with this delicate flower Bro.

I got Quinn on my reroll.

He's pretty cute for a dude, I suppose. Still better than Kha'Zix.
Quinn is a girl...

> [{quoted}](name=Canada Gabe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PEfkPlvN,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2014-12-17T22:55:09.866+0000)
>
> Quinn is a girl...

;)
{{champion:10}} I can admire dedication and a strong will. Hopefully the differences in biology don't cause any issues or require dietary changes.
Lux. Hue.

{{champion:33}} 



Eh, ok.
{{champion:72}} .... uh lets try again. {{champion:133}}  That works.

I got {{champion:99}} ! Sweet! She's smart and pretty, her only downfall is her laugh.

But of course I had to click reroll.....But it's okay! Because now I have {{champion:10}}  who looks beautiful without her helm, and I like even more! Who doesn't want an angel?

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PEfkPlvN,comment-id=0039,timestamp=2014-12-29T12:23:11.142+0000)
>
> I got {{champion:99}} ! Sweet! She's smart and pretty, her only downfall is her laugh.

That and her crippling depression.
Fuuuu I got {{champion:29}}  rerolled and got {{champion:105}} not much better
Can we have an "Well... they are inhuman..." option of some kind please? My first one was Veigar and none of the options really work except "NO!".
I would have to make another topic to get this option...I would if I could. I kinda understand how you are thinking though.
{{champion:36}} MUNDO BEST{{champion:36}}
{{champion:114}}  very happy with this actually o.o
{{champion:53}} T_T all he wants to do is grab me

{{champion:56}}  Well hes black...
I rerolled beacause the constant nightmares got annoying and got
{{champion:143}} Im cool and all but the thorns may hurt

{{champion:24}} 
What is he even?  What if he tries to jump on me?
Got Akali, I'm happy about this, but slightly scared...

{{champion:18}} , um... um... it wont fit

HUEHUEHUEHUE
i got irelia

{{champion:103}} 

OK

{{champion:127}} 


Umm...

{{champion:101}}, not only am I the same gender as him, I have no idea how this relationship will work out...
at all.

Well I got Cassiopia,
Lets see what we can do about her. {{champion:12}}
